article:
Seven cats are best friends. They live in the same town. They always go shopping together on Saturdays. Every time one of them picks a place to go.
Today, a _ named Mimi should pick a place, but she doesn't give _ calls to her friends. The other cats are angry. They all go to Mimi's house and ask her, "You give us no call. _ ?"
Mimi hears this and begins to cry. She _ , "I will move to a new house with my father. It is in another town. I _ go shopping with you again."
Her friends hear that and talk for a long time. Then they have an idea. "Don't _ . We will go to that town and do the shopping _ your new house."
Mimi is very happy. She jumps high.
Two days later, Mimi comes to her friends and says, "I don't _ to move. My father finds a new job here in this town."
Her friends are happy again. They still go shopping together on _ .
